info.name: Dark Green Batoto
info.description: A dark green version of Batoto, it works with the sites new style. You can change the texture with their new style as well and the theme still works. Any suggestions contact me via Twitter @FinalFateOfAll
info.additionalInfo:
Trying out a slightly darker text color. Let me know what you think and if I should switch it back.

10/6
*Fixed top search button color
*Fixed colors for forum
*Fixed colors for members
*Fixed colors for donate
*Fixed colors for chat
*Minor color fixes

older:
*Fixed the text color of the total comments on a page
*Fixed colors of comment page navigation buttons
*Fixed mature content warning, removed jarring background color
